text: Malaa, goodou hula gi Shiloh, di gowaa dela ne hilihili ko Au i di matagidagi belee hagalaamua ai dogu ingoo go goodou, gei goodou ga modongoohia be di ma di aha dela ne hai ko Au gi di gowaa deelaa, idimaa nia huaidu o agu daangada go digau Israel.7.12 Joshua 18.1; Pisalem 78.60; Jeremiah 26.6
